solution_line_template: We know all three girls ate {total_nuggets} nuggets total, so {total_nuggets} nuggets = {alyssa_factor}A (how many Alyssa ate) + {keely_factor}A (how many Keely ate) + {kendall_factor}A (how many Kendall ate) or {total_nuggets} = {alyssa_factor}A + {keely_factor}A + {kendall_factor}A which is {total_nuggets} = {total_factor}A
Then we will divide each side by {total_factor} to figure out how many nuggets Alyssa ate, {total_nuggets}/{total_factor} = {total_factor}A/{total_factor} or {alyssa_nuggets} = A.
